pwn.name: MyLittlePwny
pwn.desc: Hey, do you see what I see? It's buffer overflow snow! Go grab your nop sled and slide right into EIP! Last at the shell is a $cr1p7 k1dd13!

pwn.name: retFTW
pwn.desc: Who would even check array boundaries? It's too much hassle. Nah, I'm just gonna copy everything, what can go possibly wrong?

rev.name: BrainFruck
rev.desc: I recently got this strange email. I'm worried about my money. I think that someone is trying to f**k with my brain. Can you tell me what does it mean?

rev.name: BtSEmulator
rev.desc: I bet you can't crack BtS-emulator ;)

rev.name: ShakeIt
rev.desc:
We have acquired hash of the flag in a database leak.
We've heard that you are a cryptoanalyst,
so better crack this flag or we'll be
forced to force a wrench UYB
